Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Lowe
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentowrth, then resume their normal route due to fire department activity near 69th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentowrth, then resume their normal route due to fire department activity near 69th/Lowe.

Allow extra travel time.
